byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio holds rally in Washington, DC, as centerpiece of national tour to promote liberal causes; unveils campaign he calls The Progressive Agenda and expresses belief that liberal ideals are spreading across country.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio introduced his campaign, “The Progressive Agenda,” complete with a wish list of reforms, like raising the federal minimum wage and mandating paid family leave.

headline.main: De Blasio, in Washington, Unveils Campaign to Promote Liberal Causes
headline.print_headline: Mayor Unveils a Campaign to Promote Liberal Causes

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio introduced his campaign, “The Progressive Agenda,” complete with a wish list of reforms, like raising the federal minimum wage and mandating paid family leave.
